about.paragraf_1: Hola! I am a Frontend Web Developer who focuses on building modern interfaces that are scalable, maintainable, and product-oriented. Experienced in using Nuxt.js (including Nuxt 4), Astro.js, and the Vue ecosystem, I am used to designing frontend architecture that is neat, data-driven, and comfortable for users to use.
about.paragraf_2: I not only implement features, but also think about data flow, component structure, performance, and overall user experience. I am quite detailed in terms of UI/UX, starting from system-based dark mode, motion that feels natural, to design consistency, without sacrificing code quality and readability..
about.paragraf_3: Experienced in dealing with real system requirements and business contexts, I enjoy the role of a problem solver bridging product, design and technical solution needs. In the future, I am ready to grow into a Senior Frontend Engineer.
